Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry

Literature.Title: Bi-functional peptides with both trypsin-inhibitory and antimicrobial activities are frequent defensive molecules in Ranidae amphibian skins.
Literature.Author: Yan X, Liu H, Yang X, Che Q, Liu R, Yang H, Liu X, You D, Wang A, Li J, Lai R.
